scenario.name: Call
scenario.send:
NOTIFY sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch][pid] From: sipp <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 NOTIFY Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Event: message-summary Subscription-State: active Content-Type: application/simple-message-summary Content-Length: [len]
Messages-Waiting: no Voice-Message: 0/6 (0/2)
